Serialized Form

  • Package tron

    • Class tron.GameBoard

      class GameBoard extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • BOARD_HEIGHT
          int BOARD_HEIGHT
          The height of the game board.
        • BOARD_WIDTH
          int BOARD_WIDTH
          The width of the game board.
        • controller
          GameController controller
          The game controller responsible for managing game flow and transitions.
        • DOT_SIZE
          int DOT_SIZE
          The size of each step for motorcycle movement.
        • gameTime
          int gameTime
          Tracks the elapsed game time in milliseconds.
        • gameTimer
          Timer gameTimer
          Timer to manage game updates.
        • motorcycles
          ArrayList<Motorcycle> motorcycles
          The list of motorcycles participating in the game.
        • timeLabel
          JLabel timeLabel
          A label to display the game time.
